replies.onlyOwner:
```diff
- Bored? This command is not for you! Don't touch it!```
replies.botPerm:
**-# I (the bot) don’t have the required permissions to execute the command {mention_command}!
Required permissions: [{bot_perms}]**
replies.userPerm:
**-# You don’t have the required permissions to use the command {mention_command}!
Required permissions: [{user_perms}]**
replies.cooldown: **-# Due to excessive usage, you are temporarily banned from using the {mention_command} command. You can use it again after <t:{expired_timestamp}:R>.**

ephemeral.description: Do you want to keep this message hidden?

replies.noChannelError:
```diff
- You need to connect to a voice channel.```
replies.notMatchedVoice:
```diff
- Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the channel I’m in.```
replies.noPermToView:
```diff
- I cannot view the channel. Please grant me the 'View Channel' permission.```
replies.noPermToConnect:
```diff
- I cannot connect to the channel. Please grant me the 'Connect to Channel' permission.```
replies.userDeaf:
```diff
- You cannot use this command while you are deafened.```
replies.clientMute:
```diff
- Please unmute me first before trying again.```
replies.guildCreate: **-# I’ve recently joined a new server, now I’m in `{guilds}` servers.**
replies.guildDelete: **-# I’ve been removed from a server, but I’m still in `{guilds}` servers.**
replies.webhookBug: There’s an issue sending errors to the Discord webhook!
replies.ipError: Unfortunately, your IP has been blocked by Discord. It’s recommended to use a new IP.
replies.loginError: An error occurred. Either your bot token is incorrect or some bot permissions have been disabled :(
replies.noTokenError: You haven’t entered your bot token in the config.js or .env file!
replies.guildAlert: **-# The total number of servers I’m in is now `{guilds}`.**

modals.reportModalLabel: What would you like to report?
modals.reportModalPlaceholder: Example: Hi, when I used the bot, the help command didn't work.
modals.sendReport:
```diff
+ Your report has been successfully sent to the developers and will be reviewed within a few days.```

replies.sendPrefix: My prefix in this server is: {prefix}

setup.description: Save server settings to the database.

replies.success: **-# The radio control panel was successfully set up in the <#{channel}> channel.**
replies.doDeleteChannel: **-# To set up the panel in a new channel, please select the desired channel. The current channel <#{channel}> is already registered for the panel. If you wish to delete it, use the buttons below.**
replies.deleteChannel: **-# The channel was successfully removed from the database.**

prefix.description: Set a custom prefix for bot commands.

replies.doDeletePrefix: **-# The current command prefix for this server is `{prefix}`. To change it, please enter a new prefix. To revert to the default, use the buttons below.**
replies.deletePrefix: **-# The bot's prefix has been reset to the default (`{prefix}`).**
replies.success: **-# The bot's prefix has been successfully changed to {prefix}!**

replies.doDeleteLanguage: **-# To change the bot's language, select a new one. To revert to the default language, use the buttons below.**
replies.deleteLanguage: **-# The bot's language has been reset to the default (`{language}`).**
replies.success: **-# The bot's language has been successfully changed to `{language}`!**

replies.invalidUser:
This button is for {author} only, and you are not authorized to use it.
To use the buttons, run the command "{mention_command}".
replies.noPlayerError: No player is active on this server. Please create a player.
replies.notMatchedVoice: Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the channel I'm in.
replies.success: The music playback panel was successfully set up in the {channel} channel.

embed.author: Bot Guide
embed.value1:
>>> Hello! I'm **{username} {emote}**
I'm an advanced radio bot designed for voice channels, providing users with a wide variety of high-quality online radio stations to enjoy. Whether you're looking to relax or manage your server's music experience, Padio has you covered!
embed.value2: >>> To see all the commands, click on the menu below this message.

invite.description: Get the invite link for the bot.

replies.embedFooter: Make sure to configure the permissions properly if using the No Role invite!
replies.embedDescription: Choose one of the invite links below based on your preferences:

afk.description: Enable AFK mode for the server’s voice channel.

options.channel: Please select your desired voice channel.

replies.noChannelError:
```diff
- Please mention a voice channel or join one.```
replies.noPlayerError:
```diff
- No player is active on this server. Please create a player.```
replies.notMatchedVoice:
```diff
- Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the channel I’m in.```
replies.success: The music playback panel was successfully set up in the {channel} channel.
replies.doDeleteChannel: **-# To change the AFK channel, please mention the new one. To remove it from the database, use the buttons below.**
replies.deleteChannel: **-# The channel was successfully removed from the database.**

play.description: Play a radio station in the voice channel.

options.station: Please select one of the stations.

replies.onlyPanel: This command can only be used in the <#{channel}> channel.
replies.invalidQuery:
**-# The selected station is invalid! Please choose from the stations below:**
```json
{stations}```

stop.description: Stop and remove the player from the voice channel.

replies.stopped: The player was successfully stopped and removed.

volume.description: Set or display the player’s volume.

options.input: Please select a volume level between 0 and 200.

replies.footer: To change the volume, use the command '/volume <1-200>'.
replies.invalidInput:
```diff
- Invalid input. Please enter a number between 0 and 200.```
replies.success: The player’s volume was successfully changed to `{volume}%`.

replies.invalidStatus:
```diff
- Invalid status!
+ Correct input: status:[status name]
+ Status name can be one of the following: [{status}]```
replies.invalidActivity:
```diff
- Invalid activity!
+ Correct input: type:[activity name]
+ Activity type can be one of the following: [{activity}]```
replies.success:
✅| The bot's status has been temporarily changed.
```js
{data}```

guilds.description: Display the list of the bot's servers.
